name: Access Advisors
goal: Access Advisors is a Brussels-based public affairs consultancy specialising in bridging the gab between organisations that have social or environmental ideas and policy makers. Our objective is to provide its clients with services which are flexible, have added value, and maintain a high code of ethics.
interests: Climate Action, Education and training, European Neighbourhood Policy, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives:
Digitisation and Innovation
Foreign affairs and security policy
Humanitarian aid and civil protection
Trade policies
EU Funding Programmes with a special focus on Horizon 2020, AMIF, and Erasmus+
